mapper.select: SELECT ID, PICTURE, TITLE, ART_NAME, GENRE, ALBUM_ID FROM ( SELECT RANK() OVER (ORDER BY DOWNLOAD_CNT DESC, ID ASC) AS RN, TITLE, ART_NAME, GENRE, ID, PICTURE, ALBUM_ID FROM MUSIC ) WHERE RN > (#{cri.pageNum}-1) * #{cri.amount} AND RN <= #{cri.pageNum} * #{cri.amount}
SELECT * FROM MUSIC WHERE GENRE = #{genre} ORDER BY DOWNLOAD_CNT DESC

SELECT ID, PICTURE, TITLE, ART_NAME, GENRE, DOWNLOAD_CNT, ALBUM_ID FROM (SELECT RANK() OVER (ORDER BY DOWNLOAD_CNT DESC, ID ASC) AS RN, ID, PICTURE, TITLE, ART_NAME, GENRE, DOWNLOAD_CNT, ALBUM_ID FROM MUSIC WHERE GENRE=( SELECT GENRE FROM MEMBER WHERE ID=#{id})) WHERE RN > (#{cri.pageNum}-1) * #{cri.amount} AND RN <= #{cri.pageNum} * #{cri.amount}
SELECT COUNT(ID) FROM (SELECT ID FROM MUSIC WHERE GENRE=(SELECT GENRE FROM MEMBER WHERE ID=#{id}))

SELECT ID, TITLE, ART_NAME, FILE_ID, PICTURE, ALBUM_ID, GENRE FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS RN, ID, TITLE, ART_NAME, FILE_ID, PICTURE, ALBUM_ID, GENRE FROM MUSIC WHERE UPPER(TITLE) LIKE UPPER('%'||#{title}||'%')) WHERE RN > (#{cri.pageNum}-1) * #{cri.amount} AND RN <= #{cri.pageNum} * #{cri.amount}
SELECT COUNT(ID) FROM MUSIC WHERE UPPER(TITLE) LIKE UPPER('%'||#{title}||'%')
SELECT * FROM MUSIC m WHERE ALBUM_ID = #{id} ORDER BY DOWNLOAD_CNT DESC

SELECT ID, PICTURE, TITLE, ART_NAME, PRICE, FILE_ID FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS RN, ID, PICTURE, TITLE, ART_NAME, PRICE, FILE_ID FROM MUSIC WHERE ID IN (SELECT MUSIC_ID FROM PURCHASED_MUSIC WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{id})) WHERE RN > (#{cri.pageNum}-1) * #{cri.amount} AND RN <= #{cri.pageNum} * #{cri.amount}
SELECT COUNT(ID) FROM (SELECT ID FROM MUSIC WHERE ID IN (SELECT MUSIC_ID FROM PURCHASED_MUSIC WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{id}))
SELECT * FROM MUSIC m JOIN WISHLIST_MUSIC w ON(m.ID = w.MUSIC_ID) WHERE w.WISHLIST_ID= #{id} ORDER BY w.ORDERS
SELECT ID FROM MUSIC WHERE TITLE = #{title} AND ART_NAME = #{artName)
